column1: The Pit Room////Loved this placed was lucky it was opened while I was in Houston. I was only in Houston for a few days. The days where Sunday and Monday when all of the highly rated restaurants where closed. That is ok because on Sunday i went to the Houston BBQ fest where all the highly rated restaurants where and their food didn't impress me. However
column2: this place was opened on Monday night and even the police was there to eat so that tells you something. Got 1/2 lb of lean and 1/2 lb fatty brisket. It was very good just as good as the top rated places in Austin. I am glad I was able to go to this place on my last night in Houston.
